channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: A comprehensive resource covering Smart Home Tech, detailed Single Board Computers (SBC) reviews, mini PC, Home Automation, HomeLab upgrades, and Home Assistant guides.

item.title: GL.iNet Comet KVM Pro Review: Wi-Fi 6 KVM-over-IP with 4K HDMI Out Passthrough
item.description: Comet KVM Pro packs Wi-Fi 6 KVM-over-IP, 4K30 HDMI Out, mic/audio, virtual media, Tailscale, plus cloud or self-hosted management for painless remote machine control.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: I Built A DIY 10 Inch Server Rack
item.description: DIY 10-inch rack using 2020 aluminium profiles—ideal for SBCs and home labs. Includes 3D print files and full build guide.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: GL.iNet Slate 7 (GL‑BE3600) Review: Your Ultimate Wi‑Fi 7 Travel Router
item.description: Discover the GL.iNet Slate 7: a compact Wi‑Fi 7 travel router with dual 2.5GbE ports, touchscreen interface, and OpenWrt for secure, high-speed connectivity anywhere.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Comet KVM (GL‑RM1) Review: The Best Affordable KVM Over IP for Remote Access
item.description: The Comet KVM (GL-RM1) provides reliable, BIOS-level remote access over IP with HDMI and USB-C support—perfect for IT pros, home labs, and server maintenance, all without subscription fees.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
